sub_species.name: Western nightingale
sub_species.description: Western Europe, North Africa and Asia Minor, wintering in tropical Africa

sub_species.name: Caucasian nightingale
sub_species.description: The Caucasus and eastern Turkey to southwestern Iran and Iraq, wintering in East Africa

sub_species.name: Eastern nightingale
sub_species.description: The Aral Sea to Mongolia, wintering in coastal East Africa
